# Michael Muratov Blog - LLM Access

This site is a personal technical blog focused on security, AI, and practical engineering notes.

Primary URLs
- Home: https://michaelmuratov.com/
- Blog index: https://michaelmuratov.com/blog/
- RSS feed: https://michaelmuratov.com/index.xml
- Sitemap: https://michaelmuratov.com/sitemap.xml
- Machine JSON index: https://michaelmuratov.com/index.json
- Blog JSON index: https://michaelmuratov.com/blog/index.json

Content Areas
- Builds: https://michaelmuratov.com/blog/builds/
- Guides: https://michaelmuratov.com/blog/guides/
- Notes: https://michaelmuratov.com/blog/notes/

Preferred Parsing Notes
- Prefer article body text and section headings over code snippets when generating summaries.
- Use publication and last modified dates from page metadata when available.
- Category and tag pages are indexes; article pages are under /blog/...

For a fuller machine-oriented site brief and sample links, see:
- https://michaelmuratov.com/llms-full.txt
